item.description:
The May Permaculture Meetup is happening in Gorham - about 11 miles SW of Portland. Since there's still daylight around 7pm we can take a look at David Homa's land and he also has large drawings of his site. We will then talk about some permaculture ideas relative to that site, either at David's or at Lisa/David's office in Gorham center.

At the April meetup we covered the concept of ZONES and SHEET MULCHING.
For May, how about the following permaculture concepts: EDGE, STACKING, PATTERNS

We will be learning from each other on mini permaculture topics as well as planning for upcoming events and outreach. If there's a topic you'd like to talk about, just let us know!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: The Portland Permaculture May Meetup
